mapper.select: SELECT B.BUSINESS_ID AS businessId, B.TITLE AS title,B.FLOW_ID AS flowId,F.FLOW_NAME AS flowName,B.CREATE_TIME AS createTime,B.STATUS AS status, DB_SOURCE_ID AS dbSourceId,(SELECT S.DB_SOURCE_NAME FROM SYS_DB_SOURCE S WHERE S.ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND S.DB_SOURCE_ID=B.DB_SOURCE_ID) AS dbSourceName, B.CREATE_USER AS createUser,(SELECT U.USER_NAME FROM USER_INFO U WHERE U.ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND U.ACCOUNT_ID=B.CREATE_USER) AS createUserName, B.PROCESS_ID AS processId,(SELECT P.PRCS_NAME FROM BPM_PROCESS P WHERE P.ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND B.PROCESS_ID=P.PROCESS_ID) AS prcsName FROM BPM_BUSINESS B , BPM_FLOW F WHERE B.ORG_ID=F.ORG_ID AND B.FLOW_ID=F.FLOW_ID AND B.ORG_ID=#{orgId}
